overview:
Jeremy Brown is an IT consultant who has a broad range of skills and has worked on a wide range of technical roles with over 10 years experience in industry and consulting. He has worked in the Telecoms, Mobile, Resources and Financial industries.

As a Software Engineer Jeremy has written software for mobile phones, from the core operating system to native and Java based applications. He has developed software throughout the entire systems lifecycle from design, development and testing through to the deployment and support of an application.

As a Consultant Jeremy has played key architectural and development roles for various clients, this combined his business knowledge with his engineering skills to deliver working software for clients in a tight time frame. He has worked on a BRMS system that processes millions of financial transactions per day, lead teams of developers in both the UK and in India, re-engineered a critical financial system to vastly improve performance and worked on projects from many different industries during this period.

More recently as a Consultant, Jeremy has worked for clients in Europe and Africa and work has included setting up outsourcing and software development capabilities in new markets, carrying out data center design, optimisation and virtualisation and network infrastructure consulting.
